value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Embedded Step by Step series. Myself Dhruvin Shah. The entire series is dedicated to the Intermediate level of Power BI folks. value.title: Maintain Tab Order for Power BI Report
value.excerpt: During this session, we will talk about how we can maintain Tab Order for Power BI Report. From a report accessibility standpoint, it is necessary to maintain tab order for our Power BI Report. Sometimes when end users are accessing the Power BI Report, they are using keyboard key “Tab” to move between

value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx
